about: ... is a full-stack software developer, with a background in enterprise java applications, and a history of teaching programming courses.
He enjoys coding challenges, toy-problems, building out cool websites, and learning and sharing neat tricks and tips from the amazing developing community.

Currently you can find Travis at DevMountain as an assistant teacher for their 13 week Immersive Web Development course, but on his free time you can find him building new projects or just enjoying time with friends.

quotes.message: The first step is to establish that something is possible; then probability will occur.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.message: Every great developer you know got there by solving problems they were unqualified to solve until they actually did it.
quotes.author: Patrick McKenzie

quotes.message: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
quotes.author: John Woods

quotes.message: Machines take me by surprise with great frequency.
quotes.author: Alan Turing

quotes.message: It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.
quotes.author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quotes.message: No one in the brief history of computing has ever written a piece of perfect software. It's unlikely that you'll be the first.
quotes.author: Andy Hunt

quotes.message: One of the best programming skills you can have is knowing when to walk away for awhile.
quotes.author: Oscar Godson
